name: Moskva City Car Driving Sim
description:
Moskva City Car Driving Sim is a game that will not only test your skills in controlling the car but also need full attention to traffic rules. You can drive on road and explore big environment in a garage full of unique cars.
Features:
- Realistic damage system
- Stunning world scenarios
- Many achievements to get
- Realistic car physics
- Easy and smooth car controls
- Leaderboards and Achievements
- Realistic car driving
